column2: "...huff, huff...C-curse that little brat!"
"My power...my beautiful face! This shame and disgrace...she will pay!"
"My, my. So this is your true nature, eh, [Apprentice]?"
"[Loser]... Out with it, failure!"
"Heh, snappy aren't we? Who was it again that saved you from certain death?"
"That's no way to greet your savior, worm."
"I could stamp you out here and now if you'd like?"
"...just try it! I'll dine on your flesh from the inside out!"
"No thank you. This pointless dialogue has killed enough of my brain cells already."
"Then what does the traitorous black sheep of the family want from me?"
"I'm no traitor. The ARKS, the darkers, yes, everything in this world...are nothing but pawns to me."
"Enough of your bullshit, tell me what you want!"
"Oh, come now...all I want is your cooperation."
"While my control of ARKS is expanding, that child you exchanged blows with--she's a complete mystery"
"The Three Heroes bend to my whim, yet only that child escapes my reach. Xion keeps getting in my way."
"Catch my drift? I want information. LIVE information. I've already made preparations."
"I want information, you want revenge. Our goals make the perfect combination, don't you agree?"
"...and I am just another pawn to you?"
"I won't deny it. But as I said, *everything* in this world is my pawn, love."
